item.description: The Melting Pot Fondue Restaurant in Framingham is having a ladies night! Share a cheese fondue appetizer and a chocolate fondue dessert. If your meal is a salad the dinner will cost $25.00. With a meat entree the cost is $35.00. There will be complementary massages by appointment only. If you are interested, call the restaurant and schedule your own massage appointment.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance. If you are late, ask at the host's station, but keep in mind - the fondue is prepared tableside and we cannot hold dinner for you.
item.name: Girls' Night Out at the Melting Pot
